Package designpatterns.utils

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    ConfigReader<T>  
    ConfigReaderFactory<T>
    ConfigReaderFactory Interface that exposes method to create Reader instance
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AESDataCipher
    AES implementation of DataCipher, allows encryption and decryption using AES algorithm
    AESKeyCreator  
    AppConfigReaderFactory<T>  
    ConfigCache
    Singleton to cache Settings of any type.
    ConfigReaderDecorator<T>
    ConfigReader decorator to add extra functionality to configReader
    DataCipher
    Abstract class that exposes Factory method to create Cipher.
    DSADataCipher
    concrete DSA DataCipher that create an instance of DSA Cipher to be used for encryption/decryption
    DSAKeyPairCreator  
    JSONConfigReader<T>  
    KeyCreator  
    KeyPairCreator  
    RSADataCipher
    concrete RSA DataCipher that create an instance of RSA Cipher to be used for encryption/decryption
    RSAKeyPairCreator  
    SecureAppConfigReaderFactory<T>  
    SecureConfigReader<T>
    Concrete Secure configReader that decrypts settings file before binding it to a class
    XMLConfigReader<T>
